Hi,

I have a ContenControl Adapter and it seems to me that the transition between views is too slow. I am comparing this adapter with the tabControl adapter that is much more faster. When I activate a view that is already loaded it seems to take sometimes 2 seconds to appear. The view is empty and there is no service called.

I know that you can consider two seconds acceptable but if I have a contentcontrol and change its content the transition is immediate. Even with the supposed addtional work because of Prism I beleive that this is very high. For now I have only 4 Views I cannot imageine when other views were loaded.

Besides that the TabControl is almost immediate.

Whant can I do to make it faster ???

Thanks in advance
